tool.name: CollectRnaSeqMetrics

param.name: out_prefix
param.label: Title for the output file
param.help: Use this remind you what the job was for.

param.name: REF_FLAT
param.label: Gene annotations in refFlat form. Format described here: http://genome.ucsc.edu/goldenPath/gbdDescriptionsOld.html#RefFlat Required.

param.name: opt
param.label: Identify ribosomal bases
param.help: If 'no' is selected, no bases will be identified as being ribosomal.

param.name: RIBOSOMAL_INTERVALS
param.label: Location of rRNA sequences in genome, in interval_list format. If not specified no bases will be identified as being ribosomal. Format described here: http://picard.sourceforge.net/javadoc/net/sf/picard/util/IntervalList.html Default value: null.

param.name: STRAND_SPECIFICITY
param.label: For strand-specific library prep.
param.help: For unpaired reads, use FIRST_READ_TRANSCRIPTION_STRAND if the reads are expected to be on the transcription strand.

param.name: MINIMUM_LENGTH
param.label: When calculating coverage based values (e.g. CV of coverage) only use transcripts of this length or greater.

param.name: IGNORE_SEQUENCE
param.label: Ignore Sequence
param.help: If a read maps to a sequence specified with this option, all the bases in the read are counted as ignored bases.

param.name: RRNA_FRAGMENT_PERCENTAGE
param.label: This percentage of the length of a fragment must overlap one of the ribosomal intervals for a read or read pair by this must in order to be considered rRNA.

param.name: malevel
param.label: Metric Accumulation Level
param.help: Level(s) at which metrics will be accumulated

param.name: ASSUME_SORTED
param.label: If true (default), then the sort order in the header file will be ignored.

tool.help:
Picard documentation says:
CollectRnaSeqMetrics
Documentation: http://picard.sourceforge.net/command-line-overview.shtml#CollectRnaSeqMetrics
Program to collect metrics about the alignment of RNA to various functional classes of loci in the genome: coding, intronic, UTR, intergenic, ribosomal. Also determines strand-specificity for strand-specific libraries.
